snippet: Fabiola Gianotti, who led one of the two teams of physicists that discovered the Higgs boson, the so-called God particle that imbues other particles with mass, has been named the next director general of CERN, the European Organization for Nuclear...
abstract: Fabiola Gianotti, who led one of two teams of physicists that discovered the Higgs boson, has been named next director-general of CERN, the European Organization for Nuclear Research.
lead_paragraph: Fabiola Gianotti, who led one of the two teams of physicists that discovered the Higgs boson, the so-called God particle that imbues other particles with mass, has been named the next director general of CERN, the European Organization for Nuclear Research.

headline.main: Switzerland: Next Director Is Named for CERN Nuclear Laboratory
headline.print_headline: Switzerland: Next Director Is Named for CERN Nuclear Laboratory
